verses.verse: ( In My Distress I Cried to the LORD) שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> šîr A song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ of ascents. אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, בַּצָּרָ֣תָה <WH6869> baṣ·ṣā·rā·ṯāh In my distress לִּ֑י Prep│1cs ( lî) קָ֝רָ֗אתִי 7121 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( qā·rā·ṯî) I cried וַֽיַּעֲנֵֽנִי׃ 6030 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms│1cs ( way·ya·‘ă·nê·nî) and He answered me.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, הַצִּ֣ילָה <WH5337> haṣ·ṣî·lāh Deliver נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> nap̄·šî my soul, מִשְּׂפַת־ <WH8193> miś·śə·p̄aṯ- lips שֶׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> še·qer from lying מִלָּשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> mil·lā·šō·wn tongue. רְמִיָּֽה׃ <WH7423> rə·mî·yāh and a deceitful

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What יִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit·tên will He do לְ֭ךָ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to you, וּמַה־ 4100 Conj-w│Interrog ( ū·mah-) and what יֹּסִ֥יף 3254 V-Hifil-Imperf-3ms ( yō·sîp̄) will be added לָ֗ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) to you, לָשׁ֥וֹן 3956 N-cs ( lā·šō·wn) tongue? רְמִיָּֽה׃ 7423 N-fs ( rə·mî·yāh) O deceitful

חִצֵּ֣י <WH2671> ḥiṣ·ṣê arrows [will come] גִבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> ḡib·bō·wr from the warrior, שְׁנוּנִ֑ים <WH8150> šə·nū·nîm Sharp עִ֝֗ם <WH5973> ‘im with גַּחֲלֵ֥י <WH1513> ga·ḥă·lê burning coals רְתָמִֽים׃ <WH7574> rə·ṯā·mîm of the broom tree!

אֽוֹיָה־ <WH190> ’ō·w·yāh- Woe לִ֭י Prep│1cs ( lî) to me כִּי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) that גַ֣רְתִּי 1481 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( ḡar·tî) I dwell מֶ֑שֶׁךְ 4902 N-proper-ms ( me·šeḵ) in Meshech, שָׁ֝כַ֗נְתִּי 7931 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( ḵan·tî) that I live עִֽם־ 5973 Prep ( ‘im-) among אָהֳלֵ֥י 168 N-mpc ( ’ā·ho·lê) the tents קֵדָֽר׃ 6938 N-proper-fs ( qê·ḏār) of Kedar!

רַ֭בַּת <WH7227> rab·baṯ Too long שָֽׁכְנָה־ <WH7931> šā·ḵə·nāh- dwelt לָּ֣הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) נַפְשִׁ֑י 5315 N-fsc│1cs ( nap̄·šî) have I עִ֝֗ם 5973 Prep ( ‘im) among שׂוֹנֵ֥א 8130 V-Qal-Prtcpl-msc ( śō·w·nê) those who hate שָׁלֽוֹם׃ 7965 N-ms ( šā·lō·wm) peace.

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <WH589> ’ănî·šā- I שָׁ֭לוֹם <WH7965> lō·wm [am in favor of] peace; וְכִ֣י <WH3588> wə·ḵî but when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> ’ă·ḏab·bêr I speak, הֵ֝֗מָּה <WH1992> hêm·māh they לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> lam·mil·ḥā·māh [want] war.
